content.description: Start ten feet left and below Grimsome Wall. Climb face through thin holds and finish on the arÃªte.
content.location: Canal Cut area of Great Falls Park VA

content.description: Start five feet right of Grimsome Wall. Climb face through quartz intrusion to obvious hand crack finish.
content.location: Canal Cut area Great Falls Park Va

content.description: Start approximately 20 yards upstream from the entrance of the canal cut at the base of a large crack in the right facing corner formed by a large block - climb the crack.
content.location: 20 yards upstream of the canal cut entrance.

content.description: Just upstream from the canal cut and near the river is a complex jumble of rocks that offers several climbs.  start just up the slope from Grimsome Wall at a small sandy area below an overhang. Climb the wide chimney and pull the overhang at its widest point.   Var. Petes Detour 5.7 From the ledge below the right side of the overhang, hand traverse left and then climb the wall facing the river.
content.location: just upstream of the canal cut

content.description: Start same as Foops Junior - climb up onto the ledge below the right side of the overhang and then climb up the wall following the small right facing corners.

Canal Cut is located just downstream from "Aid Box" and comprises three small areas. From upstream to downstream these areas include: Grimsome Area, **Canal Cut Wall, & Boat Ramp Overhangs.

 Canal Cut Wall - It is important to note that the **Canal Cut Wall is off limits to climbers**, as it is a designated historical site. The routes that reside in the Canal Cut are named from the nicknames of the former indentured servants who worked on the canal.
